title: time IP boosts
body:
Just wanting someone to confidently confirm for me. If I bought a timed IP boost then bought the same one again, does it just reset to the same time therefore forfeiting my current time boost OR does it stack on top of it?

i.e if I bought a 3 day IP boost then I bought another 3 day IP boost, do I get 6 days or do I just get 3 days and forfeit the rest of the time from the preexisting one?

replies.body:
I do not know, I've never brought an IP boost. The support page says nothing about stacking.

Sorry about that.
